chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product is an iPhone 13 mini with the above problem:
The phone sometimes doesn't react and the screen is blurry. The phone needs to be turned off and restarted. Calls drop in mid-conversation - no sound. The purchased phone does not meet the product description - according to my order.

Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

You have received the product for 40073456 the 06.06.2024. The delay to repair or exchange the product is 3 days for technical issue. Without answer with a valid tracking link before the 13.06.2024 we will refund the customer.

Thank you for understanding,
Rabia from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we have insufficient stock for exchange. Instead, we have processed the full refund. Thank you for your understanding.

Regards,
JY
